document.title: South Carolina College- and Career-Ready Standards for Visual and Performing Arts Proficiency: Theatre

BB3618BECF354446956D817B619E9344.description: I can collaborate with other theatre professionals to apply dramaturgic research to a theatre work.

0F91D7706F234BA0A63C37121153147D.description: I can collaborate with theatre artists to assemble a theatrical work that incorporates budget, schedule and publicity.

2836B75387F944DDB80BC11EF612ED55.description: I can defend dramaturgical choices for a theatrical work.

A43F964224F74418BDFF57B8965E458A.description: I can compile research for a theatrical work into a presentation for other theatre professionals

91B4CAB226234E88B79024E213A3F3EF.description: I can apply research from print and non-print sources to plan theatrical work.

63624DD9650F49EF8238DC363FD1ECA9.description: I can use credible sources to research information for a theatrical work.

E1B3FA9748514276AA4DC4FE2100180C.description: I can assume the role of a dramaturg for a theatrical work.

C59EE4C0E6D54C84BC0F87E197EEC6EC.description: I can identify current technologies that are available for use in theatrical productions.

2D31ECF5DF054F24BC3A1A8F3D36B03F.description: I can research and analyze examples of dramaturgy

E9CFEFEDE635481098A46DDE3BF95ADE.description: I can explain how a dramaturg works with other theatre professionals in theatrical work.

954A3541500E4BFC93664AD9B2181FEF.description: I can identify the necessary skills needed by a dramaturg.

30C2C97D19824D959F1479124D63C285.description: I can justify the role of a dramaturg for a theatrical work.

664495A91EA943598CCA08950C31BD40.description: I can express my own opinions about a theatrical topic while citing information from multiple credible sources.

264D70CAFDF64D47AE743236CF42764B.description: I can utilize credible sources to extract information about a theatre topic.

08EF7844A107459BAF90FF862F0FE8C0.description: I can interpret evidence from credible texts to form an opinion on a particular theatre topic.

1A35C0CE57374D46BE471760D3A086F2.description: I can examine sources of collected research information for their credibility.

DC6E660C33D6403FAFBF6AC7F3E39434.description: I can identify what makes a source credible.

8768AA24BF2C43E9A345C6D9AAC0FB13.description: I can examine available resources to find those with the most pertinent information.

5284D34C99CB4A3B9970F094F17457F0.description: I can examine evidence from credible texts to support analysis of a particular theatre topic.

D4B26B05E08C42619B4259CCE15263CC.description: I can use resources to answer my questions about a theatre topic.

E9AE62B8E7A1418BBFC9086C907FCD3F.description: I can examine resources for information about a particular theatre topic.

91E9B8E1B6164238A6CE60B8856495E6.description: I can collect available print and non-print resources for a topic.

08861FE57FDB468D8E7F560F7ABB724B.description: I can compare and contrast evidence from credible sources to analyze a particular theatre topic.

4F2504BD55D24758996F0CE6549FD946.description: I can research and analyze information from electronic and/or non-electronic sources for use in theatre activities.

AFED27D2797142328FD77084750CA356.description: I can examine how the research of a theatre topic improves my knowledge.

5E2E810E4E134917ADF71F933235F97A.description: I can recognize the value of research to improve my theatre practice.

9B9F02AF2C7F498F99FB7E73C079A1D6.description: I can ask and answer questions to clarify my understanding of a particular theatre topic.

05F7206C563F4FB996F6E135041104A5.description: I can collect sources to justify my theatre choices.

23A293A7571F4B18AD9AB8627E32A0BC.description: I can cite sources to reinforce what I already know about a particular theatre topic.

E524DE4F7FFE4AA7AA346B5F291F67F6.description: I can identify familiar cultural elements in a theatrical work.

669279909E314E4A9D7674302A649AB9.description: I can identify familiar historical elements in a theatrical work.

F3C558342D7D4BB89F0DCC485745B359.description: I can identify familiar theatre topics as they relate to what I already know about a particular theatre topic.

DB18CC8971AC4CF6B108B689522CFBB1.description: I can use a variety of resources to research multiple aspects of theatre.

0519495CD63745F49F74703121806883.description: I can demonstrate my readiness for a college or career path.

6655491776F845A79D47104CF9A3A677.description: I can demonstrate skills necessary for a career in theatre.

6BAAF4975990430CBCD526FC32F2149C.description: I can analyze complex ideas from other arts disciplines and content areas to inspire my creative work.

86EEB08E7EF6459F99784D7C3618F43B.description: I can research and analyze societal, political, and cultural issues as they relate to other arts and content areas and apply to my career interests.

AF20C5D33B8E4630A18C3018A8B4ABC1.description: I can demonstrate my collaboration with other artists.

AAF51430DA0841068C714C9A7B0C94C6.description: I can investigate opportunities that will lead me to a career in theatre.

9B79BA3A4BD74F4DA3853C3989C21E75.description: I can explore a theatre related careers in various economic conditions, cultural values, and locations.

7DA1B84B9EBB40EBB346E65790EED9D7.description: I can explain how economic conditions, cultural values and location influence theatre and the need for theatre related careers.

89E58B64E528467EA37256D651FB507B.description: I can identify the skills, training, and education necessary to pursue a career in theatre that interests me.

9269E681F7FC41F8BD04D8D4719870A3.description: I can explain how various arts content areas are used in theatre.

156115590D7F4966B1E1759429D2B3D3.description: I can explore how theatre is the synthesis of the arts and analyze how my interests and skills will prepare me for a career.

9AE4AB5D275D47AA807CC1026EBA249E.description: I can research topics about careers in theatre that interest me.

729DF9BA86CA4E7092E5F4FA2120C6CD.description: I can apply concepts from other arts disciplines and content areas to work in theatre.

E0AC7A6CA0864E269BE902EC5C51C63F.description: I can analyze the concepts and materials used among arts disciplines, other content areas and how they are used in a theatre career.

EF33B94341244727ADD9B753BA4365E6.description: I can design effective marketing and informational materials for a dramatic production.

FD27742A46024DCB929E7CBDF5DC4449.description: I can demonstrate and describe the skills needed for careers in theatre.

768DFA75751C45AC9D7C73064AB427AD.description: I can examine the relationship between theatre and specific content from another arts discipline and content area.

A7B95E3B4BD5422CB626BB599D63A364.description: I can recognize specific skills shared among arts disciplines, other content areas and how they can be applied in a theatre career.

622DE83B301E499B95CCF46CBDC02E81.description: I can identify specific skills required for various careers in theatre.

BE484567BC0D446C8AE1240BD796045A.description: I can apply theatre concepts to other arts disciplines and content areas.

CF36160358EF4A12B5DDFF4FB0E50530.description: I can explore a range of skills shared among arts disciplines, other content areas and how they can be applied in a theatre career.

6D4998D9215844C08236A425246AB06A.description: I can describe how professional theatre artists work together.

2E49CCC1729A4E49BF25CED16F47A75E.description: I can identify specific careers in theatre.

6A8E2C46B0F24197925F5A4D7BD8B4A5.description: I can demonstrate and describe the relationship between theatre and a concept from another subject.

90AB44F776A0462ABDF0EB2E5479FA1C.description: I can apply theatre concepts among arts disciplines other content areas and related careers.

47B438C7CA884DA0AAA7377E1B6FEF0C.description: I can identify and demonstrate the skills in theatre that interest me.

25A81404D791459EB95BB3A1D705FFF8.description: I can demonstrate a relationship between theatre and another subject.

E5A8356CD1C94B03AFDA3FF9C45E0855.description: I can identify and demonstrate theatre concepts among arts disciplines, content areas and related careers.

5F4686BC7A6A46E6983C489BCB6A564A.description: I can identify topics in theatre that interest me.

9CCA7BDE612C4CEC9B227E31F6330142.description: I can identify non-arts concepts in a theatrical work.

C9DEAC32246B4A96BD062199CDE46D99.description: I can explore theatre concepts among arts disciplines other content area as well as things about theatre that interest me.

71E0745DD246439EA3B1A41CB5313DD4.description: I can relate theatre to other content areas, arts disciplines, and careers.

FCB808E4DBC54CC4A7689B77BD0DECC6.description: I can participate in theatre games to explore characters from other cultures and historical periods

A6605D55647A40319914FCCA31CF986C.description: I can create a production concept for a complex theatrical work respectfully incorporating aspects of other cultures, global issues, and historical time periods.

5E3F24846147419DB41A7E07B945608B.description: I can create, analyze, and perform a theatrical work based on multiple historical and cultural traditions.

E3D224446B6C49FA9B0EE1329CBAB03D.description: I can examine the role of theatre within my own culture and time period.

43A70BDB2FF94F3A83D65242B9E772EB.description: I can compile evidence showing the influence of theatre on modern culture.

6BED8069B99C4DFFB8CE3866F041BA2D.description: I can examine the way theatre continues to influence history and culture.

552CA5B63C1449B5910F782B3CF69E8C.description: I can alter a story based on an historical time period.

AD2B68C5641A42D7B8C4CD0ECD0FCF67.description: I can research how other cultures influence theatre today.

CE2E8BB3BD634878A8261B107D1F1C86.description: I can explore the influence of historical events and cultural traditions on contemporary theatrical works.

4206A0882DFB49E5B444288FD2607246.description: I can make cultural and personal connections between myself and my classmates.

9DA5351451A3488DA51020022B870A36.description: I can create a simple scene/project using another historical period as an inspiration.

BADA5E6E7ADE4994A23328D0F6039201.description: I can create a simple scene or project by applying characteristics from a specific culture or historical time period.

DAFF016595D4487BA0A9445CBDB1E5D3.description: I can participate in theatre games to explore characters from other cultures and historical periods.

A3A145568EB84310AF39FD5E866F9430.description: I can read a visual or aural text from another culture to create a simple scene or project.

34C8970D312B4277AFB0CD1AE024E7A8.description: I can research the role of theatre within a specific culture and/or historical time period and present what I discovered.

B19A271B8688415CA7BF225B9F44360D.description: I can examine the role of theatre within my own culture and time period.

06706A0AB08B4EEB9C3AB2A3F7DF3F29.description: I can create simple scenes/projects using my knowledge of a specific culture or historical time period.

C1F113BE0173430FA6318C8D2284B904.description: I can examine the role of theatre within a specific culture and/or historical time period.

C167DD3C18464AD489DA4BCB5F9F2EB3.description: I can alter a story based on an historical time period.

03757DE4C9614716B931BC86ACDEE3B0.description: I can alter a story based on a specific time period.

AF96563BC17D4CBCB15F3231CD35BD7D.description: I can relate to character experiences of a specific historical time period.

12EC80B4159A4365B65CAB8AB177544E.description: I can make cultural and personal connections between myself and my classmates.

BB4C800B175941359AC32CBEB94F1ECA.description: I can recognize how a specific culture explores theatrical elements.

ECAF449FBF5E4AF68189FC25991807E0.description: I can relate to character experiences of a specific culture.

EB59747E17274E2682068F55DF900739.description: I can participate in theatre games to explore characters from other cultures and historical periods.

B14C8D5BA3A34145BF79EB1C49970F5B.description: I can recognize that all cultures explore theatrical elements.

BC3D0709385C4A69B9E2A6C9682D65AB.description: I can recognize and demonstrate characters from some cultures and historical time periods.

A3EDFE95116A46469F51D0984B085A5B.description: I can examine the role of theatre through history and culture.

5BB0C43B9D4D47188D2305FE80D2E626.description: I can reflect and evaluate the professionalism of production members in order to strengthen my technique in future productions.

CEB99C698C9F44B89253B79425706916.description: I can evaluate and reflect on my commitment and work ethic during a theatre production/project.

C7D6B5AF9E254DF5BBD6597F2B9DC74B.description: I can synthesize the work of others and myself in production to deepen my technique for future projects

A1AC0700725047C98714BD7EDB3BBE79.description: I can assist others in the production process.

34A4A42B5829484A89D4F76A9DE9898E.description: I can evaluate how my artistic choices affect the roles of others around me.

FC3D6D9ADB5E428F86250361BECA0F33.description: I can collaborate in an ensemble, contributing to a positive work environment.

43BC894A4F9A4F329D3EA991767DDD95.description: I can predict and justify how my artistic choices will improve the final perform-ance.

6F9C5B1254A543E7AA761A0E541B6222.description: I can evaluate my techniques in rehearsal and perform-ance.

0B3EB0E241874E2F8562CBB9ACACEE70.description: I can justify a list of strategies to improve my rehearsal and performance.

F7FA78A7401A45FFAE3238E052A3B805.description: I can plan the next step in my rehearsal process.

84C7A12340B2470FA2B55D4C0CF7A213.description: I can describe choices that did and did not contribute to the rehearsal process.

8EDF7D1227414A84972519EF4D07F5A8.description: I can reflect on my rehearsal to figure out the next step in the production process.

C756C2F9BF684FC2AF9632783062B902.description: I can describe how choices in stagecraft contributed to the production process.

2F3F7B8B7A4D40A0B966A772D8969561.description: I can describe how my performance choices contributed to the production process.

882F4282054A4E7F95FAACAEE9C4020F.description: I can explain my choices in the rehearsal process.

158B864E314C4D489E00BBF206440CA8.description: I can use theatre equipment safely.

A0EAB904E4F8448EADDE9EEDAC95A153.description: I can use rehearsal time effectively.

661BAA9132124AB3B6355D29C82116F4.description: I can demonstrate theatre artist professionalism while participating in theatrical work.

3BF48D7036074BC39F73772157326AE9.description: I can evaluate why theatre artist professionalism is necessary.

1A8FD47735D04676BE19CB6FE4751AC2.description: I can describe the responsibilities of the theatre artist through his artistic choices within the context of a live or recorded production.

CC8194AAB6A9452383E3C6C5CEA1B81B.description: I can describe some performer/theatre artist choices in live or recorded performances based on a text.

AF43A92600AA42B4B80A8209922803DF.description: I can recognize how the relationship between the theatre artist and the audience can affect one another.

DB1136B4CB2C42D886872922B2A533FC.description: I can justify why the performer/theatre artist has a separate job from the audience.

22A10839892E4080925A2AEFA050E11A.description: I can explain the function of performer/theatre artist responsibilities and how they relate to the piece.

F7C56E44CCBB443A8266FA700021E359.description: I can recognize that the performer has a responsibility to the audience.

BF042CFA05F64BBEB500AACB3CF7D82B.description: I can recognize that the performer/theatre artist has a separate job from the audience.

3D31D24D0B6E4955B13FC39B47C1EBE1.description: I can identify the function of the performer/theatre artist and how it relates to the piece.

8E48F6902507408BA029BE24D9CCF301.description: I can practice theatre professionalism through observation and self-reflection.

495A418F864242E09946D1A991CFB368.description: I can write a detailed evaluation of a full length live or recorded performance, analyzing the effect it had on me.

7E842FA3F7034DBDB666C0BADE8A83E3.description: I can evaluate a text or watch a performance for personal meaning.

10A7F9CD53C546BB97C0E9DD63321EFE.description: I can construct and analyze personal meaning within the context of the performance and the world of theatre.

F0D46A3002DC406E90FE9F550CA741AC.description: I can evaluate a performance or dramatic text's themes in relation to social, historical and cultural context.

6F156A8228A74860AD0263A29D6895E4.description: I can evaluate a text or watch a performance and summarize recurring and overall themes.

7B2FDDC1D0ED41F386B80CC3E667C1B9.description: I can construct and analyze social meaning, themes, and ideas from theatre performances and dramatic texts.

68CC355B322842EFAA8667D56B726773.description: I can develop objective and subjective criteria and vocabulary in which to evaluate a performance.

3897CF7C60FE44D4ADEBA822CF77911B.description: I can evaluate artistic elements in a live or recorded performance.

3CEBDFDD6EAD4A21B78347E7FEC155AA.description: I can critique a live or recorded perform-ance based the skills and techniques of the theatre artists.

3983AD40696C48AC8FE4669AB82C3978.description: I can express my opinion about a live or recorded performance, based on my own aesthetic and artistic preferences.

487D0CF631524399884291CF71247D2F.description: I can communicate my own aesthetic and artistic preferences.

05850343B46E46718AC50D57398F920B.description: I can interpret and justify my opinion, based on the artistic choices made in a live or recorded performance.

4D91A05F37A84869A9919A3BD926EF65.description: I can evaluate and justify artistic choices.

86B74B64936C42B29D90D8CABF38035F.description: I can evaluate artistic choices and their effect on the audience in a live or recorded performance.

B90412C5AF0649CFA225FF53A6F07D8E.description: I can recognize that artistic choices are made to evoke particular reactions from the audience.

245D02F2E95942E3BF397D6C83016552.description: I can share my own likes and dislikes of artistic choices within a theatrical work with others.

6500FFEE102C4B08ACAA6B3417ADBA30.description: I can identify what I like or dislike in a live or recorded performance.

E082A7A5A3A24496B8E9A31A8ABDDF29.description: I can express my reaction to a live or recorded performance.

77EF716CC08441D5A1648C4CEBD86430.description: I can justify why an artistic choice was made in a theatrical performance.

FE8C670B45B6483EB9AC4D0E338EF370.description: I can recognize that a performance is made of many different artistic choices.

1C4EDE212D4D4976B9DE60E790334027.description: I can recognize artistic choices in live or recorded performances.

E7760F32FA73480EAAEB561327AD18D9.description: I can recognize that a performance is made of many different theatre conventions.

A0D9D9F06C7A4491A541DACDA0E73DAE.description: I can recognize that a performance is made of many different production elements.

010CEA2536884930BE8C8A2A4ADEDE58.description: I can recognize artistic elements in live or recorded performances.

F1FCB3530334419CB8BA0E9E0AC1F009.description: I can explain why audience etiquette is necessary.

29A643B0B4E541828A8E09015F598C70.description: I can model appropriate audience behaviors for the specific performance type.

752D2DA445274A84AFB84E4B7E5CFDAE.description: I can model audience etiquette while watching a live or recorded performance.

1B25494B2D024CDB9A5FB6F230701C28.description: I can interpret and evaluate live or recorded dramatic performances as an active audience member.

350033DC542145878959D7DE41505066.description: I can direct a complex theatrical piece by: interpreting, applying, and justifying artistic choices regarding stage movement, character development, language, theme and technical elements.

3895DA37754F4CE3A0D9D591A66E3D6E.description: I can explain and justify my concept to a production team.

5B0F24ADAF3A4ADA868C65E1E0F0BE67.description: I can research themes and ideas drawn from a detailed reading of a script.

D7CC6F3FE4D54581AD39502FC4451826.description: I can mark a one act or longer piece as a director.

1F4CB5B69B1B492DB3454883BDBE445E.description: I can direct a complex theatrical piece by: interpreting, applying and justifying artistic choices regarding stage movement, character development, language, theme and technical elements.

F5E761F7A37C4EBF854C4DFB88E6815D.description: I can direct actors to create effective blocking, focus, and stage presence to deepen characterization.

636B41B16291443FB2D0847ADF03ED61.description: I can pre-block a simple scene.

3D86D8585CC94BE4B25B281352CD4A17.description: I can mark a script as a director

3673DB95998C476D9D204356B11448DC.description: I can explain the relationship between the director and production team.

12A2E7021D5D4F50A71DA939E374DE20.description: I can explain and justify the role of production staff in unifying the director's vision.

CA15C8B910E04347BD13989C4B7D999C.description: I can make and explain directing choices in small groups

53295DD9A28F4D60834D78EBE9F09C08.description: I can explore movement patterns to block a simple scene.

55F3D23E31A74C508843F5990F27F70C.description: I can explore levels in the stage picture.

F977AC480DC24D319F83208C691CDF43.description: I can make choices about stage composition and simple blocking techniques.

ADBAFFDFA85D439DB843A5B690CD59AE.description: I can distinguish between different types of performance spaces used by directors.

1FA70763BD934D66BC3D4E611300456D.description: I can identify between parts of a stage.

558D0A8942264DDCB16DA9AD3C30D3EF.description: I can distinguish between parts of the stage and various performance spaces and how they impact directing.

8C9F03154D75432198825946B6191DE2.description: I can explore the basic history of directing.

7B95C9A4B9CF417997D9EC5FD44CF4B6.description: I can describe the function of the director in the theatre.

216036ABE6F14B7AA69941E144B29EC0.description: I can demonstrate simple blocking techniques.

2C3BFB3CD8544C129ABC68263A15F675.description: I can respond appropriately to directions and side coaching given to the group as well as myself.

9DB49E2641F14C6E8C736009B97731C7.description: I can explore a variety of acting techniques in rehearsal to refine my character.

A7960070FD204C8F85F22B0F245D0080.description: I can apply a variety of researched acting techniques to seamlessly sustain character in a complex theatrical work.

D238CAE537B24FD1856599BBB9363663.description: I can demonstrate artistic discipline to sustain my character choices throughout the entire perform-ance.

FACD8E21FAC34B2F8432962C491979F9.description: I can synthesize my knowledge of acting techniques to create a complex character

0D511095AAB04DBABBA5535DAB0B4920.description: I can examine research materials to inform and sustain character choices.

13EA3F7187054612A5266E918832FFDA.description: I can experiment with physical and vocal characterization choices in a simple theatrical work.
